description:
The main River of the Mesolcina (Ticino like part of Graub√ºnden) has several sections that can be done canyoning wise. While the most interesting part is between 1860m and 1670m of altitude (v4a5III), there is also a superiore part called Mucia (starting at 2000m) and a very short section at 760m of altitude with strong water flow (see the picture).
